item.description:
Portsmouth NH - Prescott Park Arts Festival always has a play going on in the summer at their outdoors theatre. The play this year is Grease!!! The play starts at 7:00 p.m., but I will be going early to try to reserve a spot for us.
Come join us on Friday, August 7th and enjoy the outdoors and a play at the same time!
In the past, a donation of $5.00 per person has been the cost, I don't know if it has gone up, will let you know if it has.
Directions to come later!
Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: look for the navy blanket with white stars on it

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: "Grease" - Outdoors play at Prescott Park, Portsmouth, NH
